karyalaye doratuwa abiyasa ada watunu mata waha the koppayak labina.karyalaye sitiyawun mage kathawa wishwasa nokala seyaki.kese ho rathriye mama mage nawathanata owun wisin aralawana laddemi.kadapatha idiriyata giya mata mage awul wu andumda madawalin wasunu sapaththu yugalada ek kachayak bindi giya upas yuwalada daknata labina.eetath wada mage athehi sirawu rosamal daknata labimen ma sihinayak nodutu bawa prathyaksha kara gatha haki wiya.ma athehi rosamal dahathunak wiya.in dolahak malawi thibuni.ekmalak malanowi thibina.ehi sitiye dolos deneki.esenam malanowunu mala owun mata dun thyagayada?

aayeth api law gana katha karamu.law kiyana de hari uththama pujaniya deyak kiyala apita hamathanadima hama denama kiyanawaya.sindu arunama nawakatha ketikatha natya aadi hama kala madhyayakma wage me premaye uththaritharabhawaya gana patta gahanawaya.romiyo juliyat diwi naha ganilla patta sira wadak hatiyata kiyala ee gana natya chiththarapati pawa hadanawaya.unmada chithra kochchara parissam kalath kohoma hari kotta panna digha gaminiya patta porak widihata thamayi kawuruth katha karanne.
